body:
@SsnL In my experiments, I often use LSTM with more than 300 recurrent cells, and if I use BPTT, the hidden states are very important, while default ```hidden``` is only valid for entire sequence training. 

In my opinion, maybe we don't need to implement per-input  ```dim``` arg for ```DataParallel```.  We just need to make ```hidden``` in RNN support ```batch_first```.
